title: Tenali Rama 2.0
overview:
The story of Tenali Raman is about a clever court jester who uses his intelligence to outsmart his adversaries and win the Favor of the king.

Two years after his banishment, a visit from Goddess Kali, warning him of the danger that looms over Vijaynagar, spurs Tenali Rama into returning to the kingdom. However, in a land where the king and the people have lost their trust in him, Tenali's journey is filled with obstacles. Can he rise to the challenge and save Vijaynagar from the brink of disaster?
